Damage cell quality control

Source: vignettes/detection-vignette.Rmd
detection-vignette.Rmd

Tutorial overview

The goal of DamageDetective is to simplify the process of making informed and reproducible damaged cell filtering decisions. This tutorial provides an outline of the steps required to make this possible, including:
- Data preparation
- Optimal parameter selection
- Damaged cell detection

All data used for this tutorial is publicly available in R through the

Data preparation 

library(DamageDetective)

Optimal parameter selection

Damaged cell detection
